Package com.deco2800.game.areas.rooms

Class MapLevel

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.areas.rooms.MapLevel
public class MapLevel
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a collection of rooms. Effectively a 'house'. Will contain all details for a single level's map.

    MapLevel​(java.util.ArrayList<MapRoom> rooms)

      public GridPoint2 getMaxSize()
      Calculates and returns a maximum size for the map, based on the size and position of the rooms.
      Returns:
      The maximum width and height of the map.

    • getBaseWallTextures

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getBaseWallTextures()
      Gets all base wall textures from the map's rooms.
      Returns:
      A list of paths to each room's base wall texture.

    • isInBounds

      public boolean isInBounds​(int x, int y)
      Check if the given x and y coord are within the bounds of any rooms.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate of the position to check
      y - X coordinate of the position to check
      Returns:
      True if the given coordinate can be found in a map's rooms. False otherwise.

    • isInBounds

      public boolean isInBounds​(GridPoint2 pos)
      Check if a given position is within the bounds of any room.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position to check
      Returns:
      True if the given coordinate can be found in a map's rooms. False otherwise.

    • findRoom

      public MapRoom findRoom​(int x, int y)
      Get a room based on a given x and y coordinate.
      Parameters:
      x - x position to search for a room with.
      y - y position to search for a room with.
      Returns:
      The room object at the given coordinate, if one exists. Null otherwise.

    • findRoom

      public MapRoom findRoom​(GridPoint2 pos)
      Get a room based on a given position.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position to check for the room at.
      Returns:
      The room object at the given position, if one exists. Null otherwise.
